Description:
Detects execution of "curl.exe" with the "file://" protocol handler in order to read local files.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Local File Read Using Curl.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%file:///%' and (process_path like '%\curl.exe' and original_file_name = 'curl.exe'))
